messages.message: How can we go about adding a third party protocol buffer definition to our codebase? Has anyone done this before?
For context, we have an external library called `foundation`, that defines a few protocol buffers - I would like to include this in my model service protocol buffer definition

Just closing thread, synced with Aaron on this. We donâ€™t currently do this anywhere, but there are examples of third-party that do, E.g. cockroachdb pulls in gogo (https://github.com/cockroachdb/cockroach/blob/651d54d393e391a30154e9117ab4b18d9ee6d845/roachpb/metadata.proto) into their build. We can try to do something similar.
